apple_vendor_description: This depiction of a couple on Apple devices features a man with dark skin tone and a person with medium-light skin tone, united by a vibrant red heart. Appleâ€™s signature glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients give the figures a warm, inviting appearance, while the heart pulses with affection. The soft rounded edges of the characters and the luminous heart convey a sense of loving connection, partnership, and romantic joy.
